name: MicroCultures
description:
MicroCultures

MicroCultures is a game of dominating a microcosm. You control the leader of the blue team and the AI is the red team.

Key to success is to capture the "bubbles" for your side. You do that by staying inside them for long enough. The small number in the middle and the color indicate the status of the bubble.

Owning bubbles increases the points, first who has 1000 points wins.

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move the player (the leader).

or Cursor Keys

Left Button - Shoot

Right Button - Build a turret in the current bubble

(only works in captured bubbles, costs 50 points).

Mouse Wheel - Zoom in/out
